DOC.brief_summary: This is a Double-blind Study Evaluating Desvenlafaxine Succinate (DVS SR) Sustained Release vs Placebo in the Treatment of Children and Adolescent Outpatients with Major Depressive Disorder (MDD).
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of DVS SR In Treatment Of Children And Adolescent Outpatients With MDD
DOC.criteria: Age >=7 and <18 years of age Primary diagnosis of major depressive disorder (MDD) CDRSR score >40 History of suicidal behaviour, or requires precaution against suicide Not in generally healthy medical condition History of psychosis or bipolar disorder Seizure disorder
